Entries.dating_Emily: I... um... heard that you and Emil are together. Congratulations.$s
Entries.Thu8: I heard Emil has a friend who lives in the desert. Do you know anything about him?#$e#Oh. I hoped she was a guy...$s
Entries.Fri8: I should save up and buy a computer...#$e#Maybe I can find a boyfriend on the 'internet'...$s#$e#What? Don't judge me! Not everyone is a cool, attractive, socially-adept farmer, you know!$u#$e#What's a guy like me supposed to do? *Groan*$s
Entries.eventSeen_101_memory_oneweek: Did Emil say anything about our date the other day?#$b#Wait, don't tell me... I'm better off not knowing. Maybe I can still salvage my dignity.$s

Entries.AcceptGift_(TR)ParrotEgg: Oh, good, it's still warm... Poor thing, where's its papa? *Whisper* ...I'll be your papa, don't worry... Poor baby.$s#$b#I'm glad you gave this to me, @. I'll take very good care of it.
Entries.dating_Emily: %Emil has a big smile on his face.
Entries.reject_866: Oh, that's beautiful... I have a friend who would love that! But he lives far from here...
Entries.summer_Fri6: You know, I'm sure Gus would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.#$b#There's so much out there, I can't stay a barman forever.$u

Entries.dating_Emily: %Emil has a big smile on his beak.

Entries.reject_866: That's a very pretty rose, dear. Have you shown it to Emil? It makes me think of him.

Entries.dating_Emily_memory_oneweek: Emil has a real pep in his step lately... I wonder why? *wink*
Entries.Wed: Emil's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without him!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Emil with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.

Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emil in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h
Entries.married_Emily: How'd the big day go? {{Emily}} came up a while ago and told me all about your plans.#$b#I'll have to come visit you two on the farm sometime!

Entries.married_Emily_memory_oneweek: Is Emil settling into the farm life?#$e#You know, I was starting to wonder if Emil would ever get married...
Entries.divorced_Emily: Things didn't work out between you and Emil, huh? Well... It happens.#$e#It *is* kind of awkward that you're both still living in this tiny town, though.
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_oneweek: The other day, Emil baked something called a 'squirrel loaf'...$u#$e#How'd it taste? Um... well, if my tail was a little bushier I probably would've loved it.$h
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_twoweeks: My parents sent another postcard... I guess they're in the middle of a cruise down the Gem Sea Coast.#$e#They said me and Emil could join them at any point, but let's be honest... who wants to go on vacation with their parents?
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: Emil's friend had this swimsuit shipped to me from all the way out in Zuzu City.#$e#City fashion is on a whole different level, isn't it?$h
Entries.Sun: My brother is so weird. Sometimes I wonder if we're actually related.$u
Entries.Event_clean3: He should take the 'high road'? What's that supposed to mean?$u#$b#You think I'm being a baby, huh?%fork$a
Entries.summer_Sun: Emil usually cooks dinner... But he makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my brother for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, Emil's not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell him I said so.
